title: Мошенники
overview: The head of a gang of scammers, Damir, is a subtle manipulator, a brilliant psychologist, an unprincipled adventurer, the author of incredible schemes to deceive citizens and extort money. It was he who created an entire industry of criminal earnings. Under his strict leadership, a whole staff of "bank employees" and "police officers" was assembled, who have been calling citizens since early morning, intimidating, deceiving and extorting.
